titles.title: If He Keeps On Blessing And Blessing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If He keeps on blessing and blessing.
If He keeps on pouring it on.
If His love just keeps getting richer,
And He keeps on giving a song.
If my cup gets fuller and fuller,
And my prayers keep on getting through.
If it keeps getting better and better, O Lord,
I don't know what I'm gonna do!
